projectDesc.p: To the tune “Sands of the Washing Stream”—"Moments of Time" is published by The Global Medieval Sourcebook (GMS), a free, open access, and open source compendium of medieval texts in their original languages and in English translation. GMS comprises computer-readable transcriptions or editions alongside new translations of texts dating from the ninth to the sixteenth century and originating in Europe, North Africa, the Middle East, and Asia. The GMS platform includes critical introductions as well as sources for further reading.

editorialDecl.p: Transcriptions and translations are encoded in XML conforming to TEI (P5) guidelines. The original-language text is contained within <lem> tags and translations within <rdg> tags.

interpretation.p: Texts are translated into modern American English with maximum fidelity to the original text, except where it would impair comprehension or good style. Archaisms are preserved where they do not conflict with the aesthetic of the original text. Scribal errors and creative translation choices are marked and discussed in the critical notes.

app.rdg: To the tune “Sands of the Washing Stream”
Moments of time and limited life,
Even casual partings can easily consume the soul.
Do not decline the chance to drink with friends and listen to songs.
Mountains and rivers fill up my eyes, I yearn in vain for the one faraway.
The falling flowers and windy rains engrave the spring melancholy.
Best to love the one before your eyes.
